info.title: FMP [tested]
info.description: This API allows for fetching various financial market data including stock quotes, company profiles, stock screeners, and income statements.

get.summary: A detailed quote of the stock's price and volume

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: The stock ticker symbol of the company

parameters.name: apikey
parameters.description: API key

get.description: A detailed quote of the stock's price and volume

get.summary: Search for stocks based on various criteria, such as market cap, sector, industry, and country

parameters.name: marketCapMoreThan
parameters.description: Filter by market capitalization greater than a certain value

parameters.name: marketCapLowerThan
parameters.description: Filter by market capitalization less than a certain value

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Filter stocks by the industry sector in which the company operates

parameters.name: sector

schema.example: Energy, Technology, Industrials, Financial Services, Basic Materials, Communication Services, Consumer Defensive, Healthcare, Real Estate, Utilities, Financial, Services, ...

parameters.description: Filter stocks based on the country where the company is registered or operates

parameters.name: industry

schema.example: Autos, Banks, Banks Diversified, Software, Banks Regional, Beverages Alcoholic, Beverages Brewers, Beverages Non-Alcoholic, ..

parameters.description: Filter stocks based on the specific industry in which the company operates

parameters.name: apikey
parameters.description: API key

get.description: Search for stocks based on various criteria, such as market cap, sector, industry, and country

get.summary: Provides key information about the company such as price, beta, market capitalization, description, headquarters, and more

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: The stock ticker symbol of the company.

parameters.name: apikey
parameters.description: API key

get.description: Provides key information about the company such as price, beta, market capitalization, description, headquarters, and more

get.summary: Financial statements of a company, including balance sheet, income statement, and cash flow statement available in annual and quarterly format

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: The stock ticker symbol of the company.

parameters.name: period
parameters.description: The reporting period (e.g., annual, quarterly).

parameters.name: apikey
parameters.description: API key

get.description: Financial statements of a company, including balance sheet, income statement, and cash flow statement available in annual and quarterly format

get.summary: Get a list of the latest stock news articles from a variety of sources, including the headline, snippet, publication URL

parameters.name: tickers
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of stock tickers

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number of the results

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Start date for the news articles

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: End date for the news articles

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the number of results per page

parameters.name: apikey
parameters.description: API key

get.description: Get a list of the latest stock news articles from a variety of sources, including the headline, snippet, publication URL

get.summary: Get the discounted cash flow (DCF) valuation for a company, a method to estimate the value of an investment based on its expected future cash flows

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: The stock ticker symbol of the company

parameters.name: apikey
parameters.description: API key

get.description: Get the discounted cash flow (DCF) valuation for a company, a method to estimate the value of an investment based on its expected future cash flows

get.summary: Balance sheet of a company. Displays a company’s total assets, liabilities, and shareholder equity over a specific timeframe

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: The stock ticker symbol of the company

parameters.name: period
parameters.description: The reporting period (e.g., annual, quarterly)

parameters.name: apikey
parameters.description: API key

get.description: Balance sheet of a company. Displays a company’s total assets, liabilities, and shareholder equity over a specific timeframe

get.summary: Get the full transcript of an earnings call for a specific company in text format.

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: The stock ticker symbol of the company (e.g., AAPL).

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: The year of the earnings call transcript.

parameters.name: quarter
parameters.description: The quarter of the earnings call transcript.

parameters.name: apikey
parameters.description: API key

get.description: Get the full transcript of an earnings call for a specific company in text format. This endpoint can be used to learn more about a company's financial performance, future plans, and overall strategy.

get.summary: Batch export of transcripts for specific year.

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: The stock ticker symbol of the company (e.g., AAPL).

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: The year of the earnings call transcripts.

parameters.name: apikey
parameters.description: API key

get.description: Batch export of transcripts for a specific year.

get.summary: Provides analyst estimates for a company's future earnings and revenue

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: Stock symbol of the company

parameters.name: period
parameters.description: Period for the estimates

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the number of results

parameters.name: apikey
parameters.description: API key

get.description: Provides analyst estimates for a company's future earnings and revenue
